taxon.author: Tanasevitch, 1990
taxon.distribution: Turkey, Caucsus (Russia, Georgia, Armenia, Azerbaijan), Iran

referenceObject.reference: Tanasevitch, A. V. (1990). The spider family Linyphiidae in the fauna of the Caucasus (Arachnida, Aranei). In: B. R. Striganova (ed.) Fauna nazemnykh bespozvonochnykh Kavkaza. Moscow, Akaedemia Nauk, pp. 5-114.
